about_the_game: Download the IndyCar Pack to receive two routes at the world famous Indianapolis Motor Speedway Circuit plus receive the Dallara IndyCar and Indy500 Pace Car liveries for the Chevrolet Camaro SS and Corvette Z06 Centennial Edition.
detailed_description: Download the IndyCar Pack to receive two routes at the world famous Indianapolis Motor Speedway Circuit plus receive the Dallara IndyCar and Indy500 Pace Car liveries for the Chevrolet Camaro SS and Corvette Z06 Centennial Edition.
legal_notice: © 2013 The Codemasters Software Company Limited ("Codemasters"). All rights reserved. "Codemasters"® and “GRID”® are registered trademarks owned by Codemasters. “GRID 2”™, “Codemasters Racing”™ and “RaceNet”™ are trademarks of Codemasters. All other copyrights or trademarks are the property of their respective owners and are being used under license. Developed and published by Codemasters.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9.4
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4GB Memory
  • Graphics: 256MB*
  • Hard Drive:11GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: The following graphics cards are not supported: ATI X1xxx series, ATI HD2xxx series, Intel GMA series, Intel HD3000, NVIDIA 7xxx series, NVIDIA 8xxx series, NVIDIA 9xxx series, NVIDIA 3xx series and NVIDIA 1xx series.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.9.5
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8GB Memory
  • Graphics: 1GB*
  • Hard Drive: 11GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: [REC_CARD_INFO_EN]

name: GRID 2 - IndyCar Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 5400+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Intel HD Graphics 3000 / AMD HD2600 / NVIDIA Geforce 8600
  • DirectX®:11
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X compatible soundcard
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows Vista 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 bit
  • Processor:Intel Core i7/AMD Bulldozer
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Intel Graphics 5200 / AMD HD6000 Series / Nvidia GTX500 Series minimum 1GB RAM
  • DirectX®:11
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X compatible soundcard
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Download the IndyCar Pack to receive two routes at the world famous Indianapolis Motor Speedway Circuit plus receive the Dallara IndyCar and Indy500 Pace Car liveries for the Chevrolet Camaro SS and Corvette Z06 Centennial Edition.
